body: I agree with @mjsax about the use of the term `side`.   But I don't have any good alternatives at the moment either,  so if you want to go with `sideInput` that's fine.

Also, TransactionMarkerChannelManager.txnMarkerPurgatory is only used in TransactionMarkerChannelManager, but is passed to TransactionCoordinator for shutting down. Could we just shut down txnMarkerPurgatory in TransactionMarkerChannelManager and avoid passing txnMarkerPurgatory to TransactionCoordinator?

> Also, TransactionMarkerChannelManager.txnMarkerPurgatory is only used in

ack.
Thanks for the fixes. I'll merge as soon as the builds finish.

@apurvam When you have a chance, please look over the changes in `TransactionManager`. I've removed the FENCED state and divided the ERROR state into an ABORTABLE_ERROR and a FATAL_ERROR. Now FENCED is an instance of the latter, just as cluster or transactionalId authorization errors are.

@ijuma @hachikuji Could either of you take a quick look? I missed this in the review of the PR -- the default for VerifiableSource/Sink is the topic `verifiable` and we missed that the topic would be missing -- the internal topics were auto created, but the test had only pre-created the `test` topic.
